name: Nimura
description:
Game made for ludum dare 36

You are the little boy who dreams of being one of the greatest samurai of nippon. Your father gave you acces to his anvil. You can create the greatest ancient technological weapons you've ever dreamt of! Step in the game and craft your own weapons at the anvil, then defeat the malicious beasts around the village! Find all materials to create your ultimate weapon! Use Z to interact and fight. Use the mouse in the crafting editor.
